text: Lucas Rossi (born 21 December 1994) is an Argentine slalom canoeist. In 2019 he won the silver medal in the men's K-1 event at the 2019 Pan American Games held in Lima, Peru. In 2015 he won the bronze medal in the men's slalom C-2 event at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto, Canada. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Argentine male canoeists Category:Pan American Games medalists in canoeing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Argentina Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Argentina Category:Canoeists at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Canoeists at the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Lucas Rossi (canoeist)
